entry.name: icon
entry.label: i18n("The name of the icon used in the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).")

entry.name: useFilledChatIcon
entry.label: i18n("Use the filled chat's icon instead of widget icon")

entry.name: useOutlinedChatIcon
entry.label: Use the outline chat's icon instead of widget icon

entry.name: useColorfulChatIcon
entry.label: Use the colorful chat's icon instead of widget icon

entry.name: useDefaultIcon
entry.label: Use the widget's default adaptive icon

entry.name: useDefaultLightIcon
entry.label: Use the widget's default light icon

entry.name: useDefaultDarkIcon
entry.label: Use the widget's default dark icon

entry.name: useFavicon
entry.label: Use website favicon as widget icon

entry.name: favIcon
entry.label: Base64 encoded favicon from website

entry.name: lastFavIcon
entry.label: Last successfully loaded favicon URL

entry.name: customSites
entry.label: i18n("List of custom sites")

entry.name: loadOnStartup
entry.label: i18n("Load website on Plasma startup")

entry.name: spatialNavigationEnabled
entry.label: Enable spatial navigation for keyboard-based browsing

entry.name: javascriptCanPaste
entry.label: Allow JavaScript to paste from clipboard

entry.name: javascriptCanOpenWindows
entry.label: Allow JavaScript to open new windows

entry.name: javascriptCanAccessClipboard
entry.label: Allow JavaScript to access clipboard

entry.name: allowUnknownUrlSchemes
entry.label: Allow unknown URL schemes

entry.name: playbackRequiresUserGesture
entry.label: Require user gesture for media playback

entry.name: focusOnNavigationEnabled
entry.label: Enable focus on navigation

entry.name: centerOnScreen
entry.label: Center window on screen when opened

entry.name: dialogWidth
entry.label: Last saved dialog width

entry.name: dialogHeight
entry.label: Last saved dialog height

entry.name: notificationsEnabled
entry.label: Allow notifications from websites

entry.name: notificationFlags
entry.label: Notification display flags

entry.name: notificationUrgency
entry.label: Notification urgency level

entry.name: notificationTimeout
entry.label: Notification timeout in milliseconds (0 for no timeout)

entry.name: geolocationEnabled
entry.label: Allow websites to access geolocation

entry.name: autoHideHeader
entry.label: Auto-hide header and show on mouse hover

entry.name: cachePath
entry.label: Cache directory path

entry.name: clearCacheOnExit
entry.label: Clear cache when closing
